name: Wiggenweld Potion
effect: Healed injuries and replenished stamina, Antidote to sleeping potions
characteristics: Green, red pink or blue in colour
ingredients: Wiggentree bark, Moly, Dittany, One pint of Horklump juice, 2 drops of Flobberworm Mucus, 7 Chizpurfle fangs, Billywig sting slime, A sprig of mint, Boom Berry juice, One stewed Mandrake, Drops of Honeywater, Sloth brain Mucus, Moondew drops, Salamander blood, 10 Lionfish spines, Unicorn horn, Wolfsbane
